name: A Dragons Business
description:
A Dragons Business is my first Game Jam game... well, my first Game actually. I've done tutorials, but nothing on my own, until now! This was super fun, and challenging! And, I really enjoyed talking with the Bored Pixels Discord community! Over a great experience, thanks for checking out A Dragons Business. It is a good start to some really cool ideas I have, I hope you enjoy whats here!

The Controls are fairly simple, click on the card you want to play, the amount of damage it does to the interloper is listed in the upper left, the amount of healing the card does is listed in the upper right, and the action point cost is listed in the lower middle. 

If you don't like the music, you can pause it with Spacebar, or select a new Track with Escape.

If you don't like the story cut scene in the beginning you can skip it with X. 

If you want to Quit the application, you'll to get back to the main screen (Die),  or get through the 3 enemies, and click "Leave and find another lair". 

Good Luck!
